title: Add uploaded photo asset to About section

requirements.summary: Add the provided uploaded image to static assets and update the About section image to reference it with an English alt text.
acceptanceCriteria: The About section on the home page displays the new uploaded photo without broken-image icons in both desktop and mobile layouts.
The has an English alt attribute describing the image (no empty alt).

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded image file as a static asset at the required path so it can be referenced by the About section.
Update the About section to use src="/assets/uploads/IMG_20251223_133615~2-6.jpg" and set a non-empty English alt attribute describing the photo.
